abstract: Stock markets had their worst session in nearly a month, as a swirl of unsettling economic news jolted investors.
snippet: Stock markets had their worst session in nearly a month, as a swirl of unsettling economic news jolted investors.
lead_paragraph: A late Wednesday afternoon tumble sent the stock markets to their worst session in nearly a month, as a swirl of unsettling financial and economic news unnerved investors who had enjoyed several weeks of relative calm after the winter’s tumult.

headline.main: Stocks Take a Fall Late in the Day
headline.print_headline: Stocks Take a Fall Late in the Day
